body.prose: Socktan Studios is a software consultancy specializing in Javascript apps and distributed (network-based) programming. Locally owned and operated, Socktan first started doing business on the west side of LA since 2003.

We are a small - but growing - group of skilled knowledge workers collaborating to deliver scalable, maintainable, and efficient software solutions. Based in Venice, California, we enable our clients to leverage digital technology to their own ends.
